title: Textile, 1920–30
description: Polychrome block print on coarse natural linen. Parrot-like bird with diamond patterned red body and purple wings with yellow end feathers sits among fantastic foliage and fruit in purple, red, yellow, and yellow-green. Condition: soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-23.
